cast.name: 玛丽·凯·伯格曼 Mary Kay Bergman

trans_title: 拼命郎约翰尼 第二季
introduction: Ohhhh, Mama! Johnny Bravo is a blond egomaniac who just loves pretty women. With spoofs of Schoolhouse Rock, The Twilight Zone, and other television shows and movies, Johnny Bravo, along with his mother Bunny and his cute neighbor Suzy, Johnny learns more about life - the hard way. Written by Ian Pugh=============================没大脑，强壮阳光，一天到晚带个nice shade和钢铁一样坚固的头型，他就是Jonny Bravo!sonychen 注
chinese_title: 拼命郎约翰尼 第二季
